column4: Excuse me, but where would be the right place to ask questions concerning third-party applications in Ubuntu?
or how can I try not to be ignored?
mate, just ask your question, don't ask if u can ask.
thanks! My question is: from Synaptic I can either install Firefox 3.2 or Firefox 3.5.4b1, but I would like to have the latest stable, being 3.5.3. How can I solve this? thanks.
